casebody.data:
John G. ROWLAND, former Governor of Connecticut, et al., petitioners,
v.
STATE EMPLOYEES BARGAINING AGENT COALITION, et al. No. 13-481. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 21, 2014.

Case below, 718 F.3d 126.

Motion of Yankee Institute for Public Policy for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice SOTOMAYOR took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
